name: Bay Area Crisis Nursery - Food Pantry & Diaper Bank
description: Free food and diapers for families in need
fullDescription: Bay Area Crisis Nursery operates a food pantry and diaper bank providing free groceries and diapers to families with young children in Contra Costa County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free food assistance
- Free diapers for babies and toddlers
- Online ordering available
- Regular distribution schedule
- Essential items for families
- No-cost support for families in need
howToGetIt:
1. Visit website to order online
2. Or call to request assistance
3. Provide family information
4. Select needed items
5. Schedule pickup time
6. Pick up at Concord location
